alert.note: Alert for Van Buren; Warren; White (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued July 28 at 5:31PM CDT until July 28 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Van Buren County in Middle Tennessee... Northeastern Warren County in Middle Tennessee... Southwestern White County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 531 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 7 miles east of McMinnville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... McMinnville, Spencer, Doyle, Rock Island State Park and Fall Creek Falls State Park. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall may hide this tornado. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
